snippet.title: MICROVISION (Baseball) Game in Action
snippet.description: This Milton Bradley Microvision video game system from 1979 features specialized graphical memory capacity for impressive visual images for the time period. It is highly portable, which allows you to take it with you in a backpack or purse to provide amusement when you need it. The Milton Bradley Microvision makes it easy for you to store all your saved game states with its more than adequate game storage capacity. The system features a powerful processor that makes each game session thrilling and exciting and is able to suit a wide range of gaming tastes, which allows you to fire up a variety of sports, strategy, and adventure games. The Milton Bradley Microvision includes comfortable and intuitive controls enabling you to move at will through gamescapes and twist and turn around obstacles with rapid inputs.
